mapper.select: select t1.row_id id, TO_CHAR (t1.created,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') created, t1.postn_name postnName, t2.org_name deptName, t3.org_name orgName, t1.postn_type positionType, t4.username username, t4.fst_name fstName from LNK_POSTN_EXT t1, LNK_ORG_EXT t2, LNK_ORG_EXT t3, LNK_EMP_INFO t4 where t1.dept_id = t2.row_id(+) and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid} and t2.org_id = t3.row_id(+) and t1.user_id = t4.row_id(+) and not exists (select s1.postn_id from LNK_INTER_USER_POSTN s1 where t1.row_id = s1.postn_id and s1.user_id = #{mvgParentId})

select t1.row_id interId, TO_CHAR (t1.created,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') created, t1.postn_id id, t2.postn_Name postnName, t2.postn_type positionType, t4.org_name deptName, t5.org_name orgName, (case when t3.postn_id = t2.row_id then 'Y' else 'N' end) isDefault, t1.user_id userId from LNK_INTER_USER_POSTN t1, LNK_POSTN_EXT t2, LNK_EMP_INFO t3, LNK_ORG_EXT t4, LNK_ORG_EXT t5 where t1.postn_id = t2.row_id and t1.corp_id = #{usercorpid} and t1.user_id = t3.row_id(+) and t2.dept_id = t4.row_id(+) and t4.org_id = t5.row_id(+) and t1.user_id = #{mvgParentId}
